## rgb2hsv() function

Converts rgb to hsv

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rgb2hsv(rgb: RGB): HSV;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rgb | [RGB](./tweak-ui.rgb.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[HSV](./tweak-ui.hsv.md)

## Remarks

The RGB components are assumed to be in range \[0:1\]. The resulting H component is in range \[0:360\] and S and V in range \[0:1\]
